name: Mechabellion
description:
[ Compatible with both Controller and Keyboard + Mouse ]

Controller recommended for best experience

   The robots have finally rebelled against their owners. They have begun to fight back, taking over cities, places of work, and even neighborhoods. No human is safe. It's up to the self-aware mechas to fight back, restore peace and save humanity before the machines wipe them out to extinction.

   mecha.Invoke(new Method(fightBack);

   Mechabellion is a first-person shooter initially intended to be a rail shooter, but blossomed into a larger project than the initial vision; offering 3 unique levels, two tailored to specific characters, and of course, an option to play as one of two mechas.

   CHARACTER SELECTION

   Chose one of two self-aware mechas: the Pitcher robot or the Construction bot. Each mecha has their own unique HUD and vary slightly in gameplay. Which mecha is your favorite?

   Each mecha has their own unique starting level, where both inevitably merge into the City level to finish the fight!

CONTROLS

Gamepad/Xbox Controller

- Left Stick = MOVE

- Right Stick = LOOK/AIM

- RT = FIRE

- R Stick Click = RELOAD

- R Special (Start Button) = PAUSE

   Control schemes for Controller & Keyboard + Mouse also provided in game via the Main Menu and pause menu.
